verb.description: (of a female dog) give birth to (a puppy)

phrases: The only sure way to tell if she is pregnant will be to have a scan at around 4-5 weeks, and she will be pregnant or in whelp for around 59-63 days.
Hohenbruck, Thornton's first German shorthaired pointer, arrived in Missoula in whelp.
All puppies are kept in the cool basement in the hot weather, and during the summer our bitches in whelp are kept there also.
I have found it pays best to give the bitch in whelp a generous feed of raw meat daily.
Its over hour drive there and back - with her being in whelp don't think that is good idea.
origin: Old English hwelp (noun), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch welp and German Welf.
